title: L
data:
==Commands==
*Pressing '''l''' will move you one space to the right.
*Pressing '''shift+l''' will move you in this direction until you encounter a [[monster]] or something else interesting

==Symbols==
While playing in console mode:
*'''l''' represents a [[list of reptiles and amphibians|lizard]] or [[List of dragons#Lesser dragons|drake]]-type monster.
*'''L''' represents a [[lich]]-type monster.
